profile_classification.rationale: The role is described as a Senior Full-stack Developer with a focus on web application development using Python and Django. While it mentions integrating LLMs and staying updated on GenAI, the core responsibilities and technologies point towards traditional software engineering rather than specialized GenAI engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van web-applicaties op verschillende manieren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development of web applications, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django
job_tasks.justification: Specifies the development of full web applications using specific technologies, fitting the software development category.

job_tasks.phrase: schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform
job_tasks.justification: Describes the creation of code with specific quality attributes (efficient, maintainable, scalable) for applications, a key software development activity.
While the integration is mentioned, the focus is on the integration aspect within a web application context, not the core development or fine-tuning of LLMs themselves.

job_tasks.phrase: samenwerken met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates understanding business needs and requirements from stakeholders.
Advising on technical solutions is part of the software development lifecycle, especially in a senior role.

job_tasks.phrase: hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on delivering software products, a direct outcome of software development efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: fungerend als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten
job_tasks.justification: Acting as a senior and coaching implies leadership, ownership, and driving technical direction.

job_tasks.phrase: het team te coachen op technische aspecten
job_tasks.justification: Coaching involves communication and knowledge sharing within a team.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with other technical roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: Staying updated on new developments signifies a commitment to learning and adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten
job_tasks.justification: Proposing new insights and recommendations for product optimization suggests innovation and taking ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring junior developers and sharing knowledge demonstrates ownership and leadership.

job_tasks.phrase: uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and feedback are forms of communication and collaboration aimed at improving code quality.

job_tasks.phrase: instaat bent om met nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten
job_tasks.justification: Coming up with insights and recommendations for optimization implies problem-solving and a pragmatic approach to improving products.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This entire sentence describes collaboration with stakeholders, understanding needs, advising on solutions, and delivering products, all of which involve communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: fungerend als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten
het team te coachen op technische aspecten
